Test steps: Verify that power outages longer than 3 minutes are recorded and stored in the meter Kat2. Verify that power outages longer than 10 seconds are recorded and stored in meter Kat2.

Purpose: Registration of power outages - Kat1 HES
Test steps: Verify that power outages longer than 3 minutes are recorded and stored in HES for Kat1 1-phase. Verify that power outages longer than 10 seconds are registered and stored in HES Kat1 3-phase

Purpose: Registration of power outages - Kat2 HES
Test steps: Verify that power outages longer than 3 minutes are recorded and stored in HES Kat2. Verify that power outages longer than 10 seconds are registered and stored in HES Kat2.
Verify that the software in the meter (except metrological software) and the communication unit can be upgraded from HES.
Verify that status is included for measurements in the reports we generate.
